trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGOTH3NAMAI_00412_NANOHANA_000_000<tab>Welcome to Namai. Is there anything you wish to know about our village?
TEXT_REGOTH3NAMAI_00412_NANOHANA_000_001<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, lovely to see you again. Is there anything you wish to know about our village?
TEXT_REGOTH3NAMAI_00412_NANOHANA_000_010<tab>My name is Nanohana. I have lived here my entire life.
TEXT_REGOTH3NAMAI_00412_NANOHANA_000_011<tab>It may not be the liveliest of places, but our supply of clean water allows us to produce some of the realm's finest rice.
TEXT_REGOTH3NAMAI_00412_NANOHANA_000_020<tab>Namai's entire economy is based on the growing and selling of rice.
TEXT_REGOTH3NAMAI_00412_NANOHANA_000_021<tab>“Namai” is actually a local term for an arrowhead, a weed that can often be found growing in paddy fields.
TEXT_REGOTH3NAMAI_00412_NANOHANA_000_022<tab>It has been hard seeing so many of my friends taken away by the Empire, but I cling to the hope that they are still doing well.

TEXT_REGOTH3NAMAI_00412_NANOHANA_000_023<tab>It was tough to accept that the Empire had taken away so many of my friends, but it is high time I stopped moping and took action. Namai shall unite to help take back Doma!
TEXT_REGOTH3NAMAI_00412_NANOHANA_000_024<tab>We could not have reclaimed our homeland without your help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We shall be in your debt as long as we live.
